accountType

Class Checking

  • java.lang.Object
    • accounts.Account
      • accountType.Checking
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CollegeChecking

    public class Checking
extends Account
    The Checking class extends from the Account class to give specifics for Checking Accounts. Holds information such as the holder, the account balance, and whether it is closed or not and can give information such as fees or monthly interest for a Checking Account.
    Author:
    Jah C. Speed, Abe Vitangcol

    • Constructor Detail

      • Checking

        public Checking(Profile holder,
                double balance)
        Constructs a Checking Account with a holder, balance, and a statement of whether it is closed or not. See the parent class, Account, for the list of abstract methods and instance variables.
        Parameters:
        holder - The person who is holding this account. balance The balance the account has.

        Returns the fee of the account.
        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Uses the Account method to make this account into a readable string.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Account
        Returns:
